DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether overweight obese pregnant African woman unlimited access health education-information technology ( IT ) base intervention package gain weight within acceptable range 8-12 kg pregnancy period . Therefore , hypothesize unlimited access health education via IT-based intervention package potential reduce onset obesity African pregnant woman . To date ( Aug 2015 ) , 95 % patient recruit , 1320 potential subject screen 150 enrol study
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy-Related Obesity Prevention Through Education & Communication Technology AFRICA : The PROTECT-AFRICA STUDY
DOC.criteria: bodymass index ( BMI ) range 25.129.9 kg/m2 Weeks pregnancy : 1620 singleton pregnancy Evidence preexist cardiovascular disease metabolic disorder ( i.e . gestational diabetes )
